attributes.action: british people living  abroad should  have been able to vote in the referendum
attributes.background: living in spain but with a bitish passport means i cant vote in either britain or spain , i still hold a british passport , and also understand more than just british views of why britain should stay in the euro uinion

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, in which all British citizens living abroad can vote, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/137601
